nodes.text: A gladiatorial tournament was held annually on the planet Nal Hutta by an eccentric member of the Hutt species. However, for the tournament around 3743 BBY, the Hutt hired the hunter Riegenn Hetuu to acquire a live k'lor'slug queen, a creature from the planet Korriban, for the tournament's gala celebration. When Hetuu arrived on Nal Hutta, both the Hutt and Hetuu were eaten alive by around four hundred k'lor'slugs that the queen had spawned in Hetuu's cargo hold.
The Hutt's tournament was mentioned in the Codex entry for k'lor'slugs in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
